Subjects: heaven, joys of; hell, pains of; advice, moral
_description: Advice about characteristics of those who come to heaven or to hell — two quatrains

CamStJohn195.First Lines:
Amonge the wyes of ParadyceWho greater ease doth
                    fynd…
CamStJohn195.Last Lines:
…that never lives content but cravesthe thinge that maye not
                    be
CamStJohn195.Note:
Added to flyleaf at front by a hand of the sixteenth century (same as
                    ‘ffor the love of…’).
